Text.Page:
I've had it with these wendigo attacks. I want you to bloody their frozen noses and take out {@LinkCreature:34#5000#Talcas}.

He's one of their most powerful fighters. Taking him out will keep the rest at bay and cheer up our soldiers considerably.

Talcas is dead? That's better than a stein of hot buttered rum!

That should teach the wendigos to piss off the Valkyon Federation!
